input.sentences: touring the architecture of the city was a favorite of mine .
we were able to go at our own pace .
when you look at the details of the building you appreciate how much time it took .
the clocks still work after all these years .
i have always wondered how they got the stones to make a slight curve on the buildings .
output.sentences: My favorite part of touring is always taking pictures of statues.
They show some peace in them.
There are some beautiful buildings that have alot of details from the past.
The clocks on the buildings make them all unique.
Most of the buildings were made out of stone.
